title: 25: Hey Siri, Schedule Sex ft. The Skinny Confidential
description:
Does the threesome count if he didn’t actually put the tip in? 

Joined by Lauren and Michael Bosstick of The Skinny Confidential, Sofia does what she does best and meddles her way into ALL the juiciness of their relationships. From threesomes, shrooms, to running a business, Sofia gets the 411 on EVERYTHING from the Dear Media power couple. Sofia also discusses addiction and how important it is to make time for your relationship…have you ever scheduled a set time to have sex? It might just save your relationship.

Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/
